PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02622011-03-03,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectSecurity Interest (GST/HST) Regulations
PrecisSECURITY INTEREST (GST/HST) REGULATIONS, in order to set out what constitutes a prescribed security interest for the purposes of the deemed trust provisions of the Act. Generally, a precribed security interest is a mortgage or hypothec in land or a building where the mortgage or hypothec is registered before the collection of an amount of GST/HST that fails to be remitted.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0055 Publication Date: 2011-03-16
AttachmentsAttachment
